Accounting and
Financial Management

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.65) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/accounting-and-financial-management-header.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Your Monthly Financials, Timely and Accurate

How profitable were you last month? If you can’t answer that question with confidence, you are aren’t alone. In fact, many successful funeral and cemetery business owners can’t realistically define the health of their business. That’s where we come in.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Main Content” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||0px||false|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Simple Text Blocks” _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Know you’re in the know

Constant up-to-date financial reporting is key to the success of your business—not from your local CPA, accountant or bookkeeper, but from funeral and cemetery experts who bring technical, numerical, and industry-specific expertise to bear. With over $600 million in revenue and more than 145,000 cases under management, JCG has all the know-how and experience to help you thrive in a competitive business environment.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

It’s time to raise your expectations

When you partner with JCG, you gain access to a team with more than 600 years of combined industry experience. Our wide range of accounting and financial services are designed to deliver value from day one:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Bullet Points” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Orange Bullets” module_class=”orange_arrows” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ link_font=”||||on||||” ul_font_size=”16px” ul_line_height=”1.7em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||-45px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • An experienced financial management representative dedicated specifically to your firm
  • Financial reports with industry benchmarking 
  • Industry specific accounting practices

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Orange Bullets” module_class=”orange_arrows” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ link_font=”||||on||||” ul_font_size=”16px” ul_line_height=”1.7em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Monthly, quarterly and annual budgets
  • Free access to our Performance Tracker X sales analysis software
  • Full integration with your point of sale system (POS)
  • Available on-site training with your staff to get you up and running quickly

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Blurb” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||0px||false|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Performance Tracker X” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-performance-tracker.svg” icon_placement=”left” image_icon_width=”70px” content_max_width=”100%” icon_placement_tablet=”” icon_placement_phone=”top” icon_placement_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”2.1em” background_color=”#F0F0F0″ image_icon_custom_padding_tablet=”” image_icon_custom_padding_phone=”” image_icon_custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” animation=”off” border_width_right_image=”1px” border_color_right_image=”#cc7022″ border_color_bottom_image=”#cc7022″ border_width_all_image_tablet=”” border_width_all_image_phone=”” border_width_all_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_right_image_tablet=”” border_width_right_image_phone=”0px” border_width_right_image_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_bottom_image_tablet=”” border_width_bottom_image_phone=”1px” border_width_bottom_image_last_edited=”on|phone” image_max_width=”70px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The complete customer experience management tool that evaluates your staff and financial performance, streamlines your success plans and dramatically improves your bottom line. LEARN MORE

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Team Bios” _builder_version=”4.16″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” disabled_on=”on|on|on” disabled=”on” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”20px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A word from our clients

JCG’s monthly reports are so beneficial, and the quarterly visits with Sheryl, my JCG rep, always make a significant impact.  Whenever I have an industry specific question, the JCG experts are always there to answer my concerns, because they know what is going on in the industry, and what industry standards are.

– Todd Schneider

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA with Background Image – Global” _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-cta-bg.jpg” background_color_gradient_stops_tablet=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” background_color_gradient_stops_phone=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-conversation.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”780px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ0ODgifX0=@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #berny-gaarsoe” module_id=”berny-gaarsoe” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”berny-gaarsoe” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/berny-gaarsoe.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Berny Gaarsoe

Consulting Chief Financial Officer

Berny brings extensive experience to Johnson Consulting’s financial services. He graduated from the University of Utah with a Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting. Having served as chief financial officer for several large corporate companies, his areas of expertise are Corporate Finance, Accounting Systems – Implementation and Financial Statement Preparation, Tax Planning, Risk Management, Human Resource Responsibilities, and Governmental Regulation Compliance. Berny also has extensive death care industry experience having created the financial management systems for two large funeral home and cemetery companies, including Prime Succession where he was responsible for finance, accounting, budgeting, reporting, auditing, human resource and risk management functions. Under Mr. Gaarsoe’s direction, Johnson Consulting has created a web based bookkeeping system, employing proprietary death care industry software that will allow independent funeral homes to control cash flow, create accounting reports, and maintain budgets.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #Lisa-Thomas” module_id=”Lisa-Thomas” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”Lisa-Thomas” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Lisa_Thomas_Headshot-BW.png” alt=”Lisa Thomas” title_text=”Lisa_Thomas_Headshot (B&W)” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lisa Thomas

Accounting Services Controller

Lisa brings over 30 years of accounting experience to Johnson Consulting Group. Having earned her Master’ Degree in Business Administration from Indiana Wesleyan University, she has spent her career in various Controllership rolls including 10 years in the funeral and cemetery industry. Her hands on, day-to-day industry experience brings a realistic perspective to JCG. Her career path also led her to establishing and successfully operating her own business for 15 years, giving her a well-rounded entrepreneurial skill set. 

 

In her down time, Lisa enjoys showing her Chinese Crested Dogs, volunteering and spending time with her husband, children and grandchildren. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #Kristen-Szymborski” module_id=”kristen-szymborski” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”kristen-szymborski” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Kristen_Szymborski_BW-headshot.png” alt=”Kristen Szymborski” title_text=”Kristen_Szymborski_B&W headshot” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Kristen Szymborski

Chief Financial Officer

Kristen Szymborski is an experienced Financial Executive with over 15 years of expertise in driving financial optimization and business transformation through data insights and automated reporting. With experience in serving various industries and having worked at CliftonLarsonAllen, a Top 8 Accounting Firm, Kristen is a licensed CPA in Arizona and holds a master’s in accountancy from the University of Phoenix. Kristen enjoys spending time with her husband, family and friends, travelling, trying new restaurants, and living a healthy lifestyle.

She is committed to being a strategic business partner to the Executive team, leading process improvements, and driving strategic initiatives. Kristen has a proven track record of increasing profitability, stabilizing cash flow, identifying high-impact problems, and implementing new technologies. She has managed budgets up to $700M and has extensive experience leading multi-location dispersed, cross-functional teams.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #sheryl-lawary” module_id=”sheryl-lawary” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”sheryl-lawary” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Sheryl.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Sheryl Lawary

Manager of Training

Sheryl brings over 15 years of accounting experience to Johnson Consulting Group. While earning a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Accounting from the University of Phoenix, she worked with certified public accountants and tax attorneys. Prior to her accounting career, Sheryl worked as an Assistant Trust Administrator in Wealth Management and Private Banking. As a Johnson Consulting Group Senior Accountant, Sheryl builds and maintains strong client relationships and anticipates their needs. Integrity is her core value. Sheryl is responsible for providing accounting and bookkeeping services to our Accounting client base. In Sheryl’s off hours, she enjoys the outdoors and the challenges of hiking.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #niccole-delgado” module_id=”niccole-delgado” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”niccole-delgado” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/niccole-delgado-round.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Niccole Delgado

Consulting Controller 

Niccole graduated from the University of Phoenix with honors, earning a Bachelor of Science in Accounting. Niccole is a current member of the Delta Mu Delta International Honor Society in Business Administration. Her past work experience in the credit and banking industry as an SR Rapid Cycle Test Analyst provided her analytical and strategic decision making, as well as teamwork skills. Her innovative ideas help strengthen customer relationships, improve processes, and fortify the company brand. Niccole’s dedication to Johnson Consulting Group’s core values and mission to provide the highest quality services, will ensure she is not only meeting, but exceeding, our clients’ expectations.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #tuyen-tran” module_id=”tuyen-tran” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”tuyen-tran” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/tuyen-tran-round.jpg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Tuyen Tran

Staff Accountant

Tuyen has a Master’s in Accountancy degree from Arizona State University. Her professional career prior to JCG was working for Food Service of America in their Corporate Headquarters in Scottsdale, AZ. In the accounting role she focused on cash management and financial analysis of vender accounts. Tuyen is a team player and prides herself on quick results and accuracy.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #Madison-Swaney” module_id=”Madison-Swaney” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”Madison-Swaney” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Untitled-1.png” alt=”Madison Swaney” title_text=”Untitled-1″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Madison Swaney

Staff Accountant

Madison graduated from Northern Arizona University with a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration – Management and certificates in Marketing and Accounting. She was on the executive board for the professional business fraternity, Delta Sigma Pi. During her college career, Madison worked at an accounting firm where she found a passion for helping clients with their businesses and assisting in reaching their goals for their business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #ryan-hill” module_id=”ryan-hill” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”ryan-hill” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Ryan_Hill_Website-headshot.png” alt=”Ryan Hill” title_text=”Ryan_Hill_Website headshot” align=”center” admin_label=”Image” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ryan Hill

Director of Accounting Service

Ryan joins Johnson Consulting Group with more than 10 years of accounting and customer service. Ryan has earned multiple degrees while studying at his alma mater, Florida Southern College, including a Bachelor of Science in Accounting, a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration, and a Masters of Accountancy. Ryan brings a unique perspective to JCG, having experience in public accounting, construction, real estate, and manufacturing industries, with his most recent experience as the Controller of a new home construction company. When he is not working, Ryan enjoys traveling, reading, playing video games, and crossfit.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #Gamba-Lizwelicha” module_id=”Gamba-Lizwelicha” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”Gamba-Lizwelicha” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.0″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Gamba.png” alt=”Gamba-Lizwelicha” title_text=”Gamba” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Gamba Lizwelicha

Accounting Services Manager

Gamba has eight years of accounting and business experience. He earned multiple degrees while studying at his alma mater, Florida Southern College, including a Bachelor of Science in Accounting, a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration, and a Master of Accountancy. Gamba has experience in multiple industries: banking, consulting, healthcare, material handling, food and beverage, with his most recent experience coming from a health insurance company where he was a Senior Staff Accountant. When Gamba is not working, he enjoy traveling, reading, playing video games, and working on personal IT projects.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Bio #simon-wong” module_id=”simon-wong” module_class=”popup” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”simon-wong” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|true” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/simon-wong-photo-round.png” alt=”Kacy Guebert” title_text=”simon-wong-photo-round” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”2px|||||” border_color_left=”#f0f0f0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Simon Wong

Financial Analyst

Simon graduated from Arizona State University with a Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting. After graduation, he worked at a student loan company as a staff accountant preparing financial documents. Thereafter, Simon worked at an insurance brokerage as a staff accountant preparing financial statements and reviewing an assortment of accounting procedures. Simon’s prior accounting experience and analytic abilities supports his role as a Financial Analyst at Johnson Consulting Group. Simon enjoys bicycling, hiking and listening to music in his free time.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Accounting andFinancial ManagementYour Monthly Financials, Timely and Accurate How profitable were you last month? If you can’t answer that question with confidence, you are aren’t alone. In fact, many successful funeral and cemetery business owners can’t realistically define the health of their business. That’s where we come in.Know you’re in the know Constant up-to-date financial […]
